It simply defines a DTO class with two properties: `roleId` and `permissionId`, which are used to represent the relationship between a role and a permission.\",\"/auth-service/src/main/java/com/koramarket/auth/servce/SessionService.java\":\"This file contains a single class, `SessionService`, which provides a service layer for managing user sessions in a web application.\\n\\n`SessionService`: This class provides methods for interacting with user sessions, including finding all sessions, finding sessions by ID, token, or refresh token, saving a new session, and deleting a session by ID.\\n\\n`findAll()`: This method returns a list of all user sessions.\\n`findById(Long id)`: This method returns an optional user session by its ID.\\n`findByToken(String token)`: This method returns an optional user session by its token.\\n`findByRefreshToken(String refreshToken)`: This method returns an optional user session by its refresh token.\\n`save(Session session)`: This method saves a new user session.\\n`delete(Long id)`: This method deletes a user session by its ID.\",\"/eureka-server/src/main/java/com/koramarket/eureka/EurekaServerApplication.java\":\"This file is a Spring Boot application that serves as a Eureka server. It checks the `Authorization` header for a valid JWT, extracts the user\\u0027s email from the token, and sets the user\\u0027s authentication in the Spring Security context if the token is valid.\",\"/auth-service/src/main/java/com/koramarket/auth/model/Session.java\":\"This file defines a `Session` entity class that represents a user\\u0027s session in a web application. The class has several fields, including a unique token, a refresh token, the user\\u0027s IP address, the date and time of session creation and expiration, and the user\\u0027s browser information. The class also includes getters and setters for each of these fields.\\n\\n`Session`: Represents a user\\u0027s session in a web application, with fields for storing session-related information.\\n\\n`getRefreshToken()`: Returns the refresh token for the session.\\n`setRefreshToken(String refreshToken)`: Sets the refresh token for the session.\\n`getId()`: Returns the unique identifier for the session.\\n`setId(Long id)`: Sets the unique identifier for the session.\\n`getUser()`: Returns the user associated with the session.\\n`setUser(User user)`: Sets the user associated with the session.\\n`getToken()`: Returns the unique token for the session.\\n`setToken(String token)`: Sets the unique token for the session.\\n`getIpAdresse()`: Returns the IP address associated with the session.\\n`setIpAdresse(String ipAdresse)`: Sets the IP address associated with the session.\\n`getDateCreation()`: Returns the date and time the session was created.\\n`setDateCreation(LocalDateTime dateCreation)`: Sets the date and time the session was created.\\n`getDateExpiration()`: Returns the date and time the session will expire.\\n`setDateExpiration(LocalDateTime dateExpiration)`: Sets the date and time the session will expire.\\n`getNavigateur()`: Returns the browser information associated with the session.\\n`setNavigateur(String navigateur)`: Sets the browser information associated with the session.\",\"/commande-service/src/main/java/com/koramarket/commande/model/CommandeStatus.java\":\"This file defines an enumeration called `CommandeStatus` that represents the different statuses a command can have in the Koramarket application. The enumeration has the following values:\\n\\n- `PENDING`: The command is pending and has not been confirmed yet.\\n- `CONFIRMED`: The command has been confirmed and is ready to be shipped.\\n- `SHIPPED`: The command has been shipped and is on its way to the customer.\\n- `DELIVERED`: The command has been delivered to the customer.\\n- `CANCELED`: The command has been canceled.\\n\\nThis file does not contain any classes or functions, but rather defines a set of constants that can be used to represent the different states of a command in the Koramarket application.\",\"/auth-service/src/main/java/com/koramarket/auth/model/Role.java\":\"This file defines a `Role` class, which represents a role in a user authentication system. The class has several properties, including an ID, a name, a description, and associations with `UserRole` and `RolePermission` entities.\\n\\n`Role`: Represents a role in a user authentication system, with properties such as an ID, name, description, and associations with user roles and permissions.\\n\\n`getId()`: Returns the ID of the role.\\n`setId(Long id)`: Sets the ID of the role.\\n`getNom()`: Returns the name of the role.\\n`setNom(String nom)`: Sets the name of the role.\\n`getDescription()`: Returns the description of the role.\\n`setDescription(String description)`: Sets the description of the role.\\n`getUserRoles()`: Returns the set of user roles associated with the role.\\n`setUserRoles(Set\\u003cUserRole\\u003e userRoles)`: Sets the set of user roles associated with the role.\\n`getRolePermissions()`: Returns the set of role permissions associated with the role.\\n`setRolePermissions(Set\\u003cRolePermission\\u003e rolePermissions)`: Sets the set of role permissions associated with the role.\",\"/auth-service/src/main/java/com/koramarket/auth/controller/UserRoleController.java\":\"This file is a Spring Boot REST controller for managing user roles in a Kora Market application.\\n\\n`UserRoleController`: A REST controller that handles CRUD operations for user roles.\\n\\n`getAllUserRoles()`: Retrieves a list of all user roles.\\n`getUserRoleById(Long id)`: Retrieves a user role by its ID.\\n`createUserRole(UserRoleRequestDTO dto)`: Creates a new user role.\\n`deleteUserRole(Long id)`: Deletes a user role by its ID.\",\"/auth-service/src/main/java/com/koramarket/auth/dto/UserRoleRequestDTO.java\":\"This file contains a single class:\\n\\n`UserRoleRequestDTO`: A data transfer object (DTO) that represents a request to associate a user with a role, containing the user\\u0027s ID and the role\\u0027s ID.\\n\\nThis file does not contain any functions. It serves as a simple data transfer object to facilitate the exchange of user and role information between different components of the application.\",\"/auth-service/src/main/java/com/koramarket/auth/repository/UserRoleRepository.java\":\"This file contains a single interface:\\n\\n`UserRoleRepository`: This interface extends the `JpaRepository` interface and is responsible for providing CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations for the `UserRole` entity.\\n\\nThis file does not contain any classes or functions. It defines a repository interface that provides basic CRUD operations for the `UserRole` entity using the Spring Data JPA framework.\",\"/order-service/src/main/java/com/koramarket/order/model/OrderStatus.java\":\"This file defines an `enum` called `OrderStatus` which represents the different statuses an order can have in the system.
